content: We're a bit short of quorum for our meeting -- https://meet.jit.si/SMARTWebMessagingBallotTriage if you want to join!

Just a reminder for the folks who have participated in these calls over the past couple months. We're essentially wrapping up the Sep2020 ballot issues tomorrow, and you can expect to see a presentation of the before and after comparison of the balloted IG and latest IG.

There may be one or two minor issues to vote on, as well, so your participation would be welcome as we cross the finish line!

For those interested in SMART Web Messaging, there is a fortnightly community meeting set up - and we'll be meeting for the first time tomorrow:
http://www.hl7.org/concalls/CallDetails.cfm?concall=54833

Bring your questions, implementations, feedback, coffee / beverage of choice!
